website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you prefer large-handled ceramic mugs. Basic, durable design for regular use.
pros: mugs that stand out for their extra large handles
Sturdy, solid build that resists chips and cracks
cons: Some imperfections in the glaze finish

customer_reviews.title: Nice Coffee Mugs
customer_reviews.text: These mugs hold the heat better than a lot of mugs I've owned. Handles are very large and should fit the biggest of hands. Price for four is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Andersen

customer_reviews.title: I love them, but one failed in about 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: I love the mugs, but one has already developed a hairline crack around about 1/2 of the base. It looks like a defect, but who knows. We don't use the cups every day and typically only use one or two of them, but have company over and all are getting use. Its unclear if the failure is new or old. Otherwise, awesome mugs.
customer_reviews.author: Jamison Briscoe

customer_reviews.title: Big Handle, Thick Mug, Hot Coffee!
customer_reviews.text: These mugs are great, and I don't mean for the price (although they are even better for the price). They're nice and thick, and keep my coffee warm for a lot longer than the thinner mugs that people sell these days. Highly recommend these if you're looking for a nice big handle and thick mug!
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Not Quite Large Enough
customer_reviews.text: Nice mugs, but when I see a 16 oz. mug I want it to hold 16 oz. of coffee and not be at the brim of the mug so I can't walk from the coffee pot to the table with it without spilling it. They are nicely made, and the handles are easy to manage with. I just wish they held 16 oz. of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Kitchen Diva

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my coffee 'bar'
customer_reviews.text: I use this product every day, holds a good amount of coffee and looks amazing. I love that it is two-tone. Handle is big enough for almost everyone to hold (I have big hands and can hold the handle comfortably without 'burning' myself). I get compliments on this set all the time. Highly recommend,
customer_reviews.author: bmulc

customer_reviews.title: Good looking mug with a great handle
customer_reviews.text: For the price these mugs are actually very good. They look good but the main feature is their big handle that makes is so easy to hold. I docked one star for overall quality as some of the mugs have small imperfections (made in China) but nothing that affects the overall product performance. I have only had these for a week and so cannot speak to durability yet.
customer_reviews.author: DaDane

customer_reviews.title: Nice cups but WAY OVER PRICED
customer_reviews.text: I bought these cups to go with a dishware set that I purchased in gray and white that didn't come with cups. The color matches nicely but they were very, very expensive for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Tina D

customer_reviews.title: As pictured...thanks!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter requested mugs with handles large enough for hand to fit through. These mugs are so pretty and exactly what we wanted. Arrived in a timely manner and packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Kim J. Beck

customer_reviews.title: 2nd set I've purchased
customer_reviews.text: I previously bought 4 of the black mugs and was so happy with them that I purchased another 4 (blue this time). One of the blue ones had a glazing crack defect (although perfectly usable). I contacted the seller and they immediately sent a replacement for it. These are the perfect size for my Keurig pods (large brew button).
customer_reviews.author: Craig B

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what my boss wanted. He wanted something that stays hot longer & good quality, love the color & the look. Best part is that you can fit all of your fingers in the handle, so it is comfortable to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Love the mugs, but wish they were cheaper
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my tiny mugs, and I love them! They hold the perfect amount of liquid, and their large handles allow me to use all four fingers.
customer_reviews.author: mason

customer_reviews.title: Great Mug
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mug set (my second). The mugs fit in the dishwasher better than a fatter mug, and when I reheat a beverage in the microwave, the liquid heats up but the mug does not. Mug and handle stay cool, a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye67

customer_reviews.title: They're great!
customer_reviews.text: Love these mugs. The only thing I would change is that they keep my coffee warm longer.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Great look, handles are really a nice size for larger nads!
customer_reviews.text: I like the cups. The handles are easy on my big hands!
customer_reviews.author: jrs

customer_reviews.title: Really like the mug, good size. But the grey is unattractive.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, big enough. But the grey is not what I would pick. If I’d seen them in person, I wouldn’t have bought them, the grey it’s just an odd color.
customer_reviews.author: $mazon Customer because I‘m passive aggressive

customer_reviews.title: These mugs are like no mugs I have ever had before
customer_reviews.text: These mugs are like no mugs I have ever had before. So purdy. Will be ordering more after I break the set I got.....
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Dunphy

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: Good size, glazing is nice and even with no bumps, using them daily!

customer_reviews.title: what I needed
customer_reviews.text: all the cups were in good shape and the size and color I wanted

customer_reviews.title: dollar stores sells better quality.
customer_reviews.text: ! dollar stores sells better quality.glaze is very poorly made.

customer_reviews.title: None came broken and good quality. I bought the lime and they were ...

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love those mugs, great addition to my grey and orange kitchen design

customer_reviews.title: Nice but didn't work out...
customer_reviews.text: These were cute but one arrived broken. They were packed very well otherwise. I returned them as they were supposed to be a Christmas gift and didn't have enough time to reorder.

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute I ordered them in orange and white.

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These mugs look exactly like the pictures, they’re very good quality and light in weight yet elegant. I just love them.

customer_reviews.title: Great Mugs
customer_reviews.text: These are far better than I was even expecting. Sturdy, roomy handle, and the color is attractive. If you're looking for mugs, these will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Androlowicz

customer_reviews.title: I like them simple and clean works well to compliment any ...
customer_reviews.text: I like them simple and clean works well to compliment any kitchen for those morning cups of Jo complete with a handle for a Man's hand to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle in DFW

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable glasses with just the right amount of internal space
customer_reviews.text: The glasses have a handle which is big enough to allow all 4 fingers through and allow you to cradle the glass very comfortably. The 16-ounce size is also a perfect, Goldilocks amount for anything from tea to hot chocolate to iced coffee.

customer_reviews.title: no problem arthritis morning coffee
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a big handle to hold with my arthritic fingers, this is perfect, cup is well balanced and not top heavy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mugs
customer_reviews.text: 4 mugs just arrived in perfect condition!! Tested in microwave oven. Unaffected!!!! Just ordered 4 more :)

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mugs
customer_reviews.text: Don't think ever had a nicer st of mugs. Comfortable handle. Mug doesn't rock when placed on table. Holds perfect amount of your favorite beverage.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee cups, exactly as described! Very comfortable to hold, even for a guy with fat fingers like me.

customer_reviews.title: Larger sized mugs at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an inexpensive larger sized mugs and these fit the bill.

customer_reviews.title: Great mugs for the family and stylish for company
customer_reviews.text: SO glad I bought 2 sets right away! Love the color and they are perfect size for my Kerrigan lattes.

customer_reviews.title: Love ‘em
customer_reviews.text: Liked them enough to go back and buy a second set.

customer_reviews.title: mmm coffee
customer_reviews.text: thought they'd hold a bit more...but no worries, great coffee cup, well made and the colors are exact and smooth :)

customer_reviews.title: This is a fine mug set
customer_reviews.text: Sipping on coffee from one as I type. This is a fine mug set, one that anyone can take pride in owning.

customer_reviews.title: For mans hands
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mugs. If you are looking for mugs to fit a mans hand these are perfect. I do wish they came in a different color besides the gray, my husband loves them.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice quality. The do not stain. The handle is a good size and fits larger hands. Nice Grey Color.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Mugs!
customer_reviews.text: Really like these mugs!! Love the big handle. All four fingers easily fit inside. Nice feel, nice balance and the larger size means it holds more coffee!

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The mug that survived shipment has been durable in use.

customer_reviews.title: wife loved the colors
customer_reviews.text: ordered two sets. wife loved the colors. i love the bigger size and strength. haven't chipped or broken one yet and can't imagine i will. dishwasher safe, what else can i say

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee mugs

customer_reviews.text: Great mugs. I like the larger size and the bigger handle

customer_reviews.text: Do not hold heat, good for tea not coffee, unless it's summer time

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Do not get hot in microwave and easy to hold for large or small hands.

customer_reviews.title: I like 'em!
customer_reviews.text: They feel great and look great. What more can you ask for? Nice size, plenty big without being ridiculous.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good design
customer_reviews.text: Very well designed with large handles for easy handling. Color is exactly as seen online. Very good product at a very good price.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT!!!!! I'm a big guy with big hands. I can fit all four fingers in handle. Very happy...

customer_reviews.title: Perfect coffee mugs
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was looking for. They are bigger than standard coffee mugs, they fit in the dishwasher, and the handle is large enough for me to put all four fingers through.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these mugs!!! Good price for the size and a set of 4!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin and Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Large Handles, Defects in Workmanship
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking forward to using these to replace all of our mis-matched thrift store mugs of the past. When they came in, they were packaged really well, and they are a great size and the handles are awesome for my husbands larger hands. The problem is EVERY SINGLE ONE of them has a defect. A couple of them are small little air bubbles on the inside that you can see. It creates holes and I don't know if it messes with the integrity of the ceramic or what. Two of them have holes/dents in the outside. A bit frustrated by this, but I guess we just hope they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Lemmon

customer_reviews.title: beautiful mugs!
customer_reviews.text: wow..i love these! they are definitely 16 oz. they are the same height as our present 16 oz mugs. can't wait to use them!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Perfect size. Very tasteful grey outer with fun red inside.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really love how these look and feel. They hold quite a bit too.

customer_reviews.title: Good lookin mug
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and pictured. New and picked well in bubble wrap and extra cardboard to prevent damage. Good lookin mug.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived chipped, broken.
customer_reviews.text: Nice mugs, but 2 of the 4 arrived damaged. One was chipped, another had the handle broken off. I would love a replacement.

customer_reviews.title: love the cups holds plenty of coffee easy to hold ...
customer_reviews.text: love the cups holds plenty of coffee easy to hold and keeps coffee warm

customer_reviews.title: Nice cups..
customer_reviews.text: Just the size I was looking for to save on refilling my morning coffee.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: The mugs are large and perfect for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these mugs
customer_reviews.text: These mugs are great. They are a larger size, which works for us. The bigger handle fits better in my husband's hand. I make tea in the microwave, and the handle doesn't get hot. I read previous reviews which stated that there were imperfections in the cups, but I have bought two sets of these mugs and did not see that in either set. I am very happy with my purchase and would buy these mugs again
customer_reviews.author: dreid

customer_reviews.title: Get ready for a grande cup o' joe!
customer_reviews.text: I really really like the mugs and would give them a 5 star & it's probably a personal preference but I would have liked the handle to have been less round shaped and more flat. I got the orange, blue and green mugs and all are bright festive colors. I love the larger size and they are just very sharp looking.
customer_reviews.author: Redheaded Hippie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my bf cause they have big handles. He likes them real well.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon T.

customer_reviews.title: False description ! should have really listened to what others were saying
customer_reviews.text: Nice colors, big handles, Good stops there. THESE ARE NOT 16 oz. Bought these specifically to brew my Keurig k cups 1&1/2 times (large serving and smaller serving) all at once. Because they are tapered There is no way.They do fit nice on the salton mug warmer. But after using these for the first time I want to tell you that the ceramic is not good quality because they get real hot on the outside and if your knuckles hit the mug while holding the cup IT IS HOT,

customer_reviews.title: New Coffee Mugs
customer_reviews.text: Bought the set to replace some older ones that didn't hold enough coffee for those typical mornings. These hit the target - they are easy to take care of and the handles stay cool. The only complaint that I have is that they don't keep the coffee hot for very long but that only comes into play on the mornings when I don't drink the whole cup immediately after I make it. And they work nicely with the Keurig.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M. Cawn

customer_reviews.title: not too hot to handle from the microwave.
customer_reviews.text: I just received them today and nothing was broke, I have been looking for a larger coffee mug and this fits the need. I got tired of heating a cup coffee in the microwave. The handles of the cup would always get very hot hot (too hot to handle). But these mug do not get hot to the touch. Thank you so much. Sharon
customer_reviews.author: Genny

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy mugs and the size is right
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for a few months now and I love them! I was looking for mugs with a darker interior color, so coffee and tea stains wouldn't be noticeable. These are great! No chips, and they easily hold the large size cup that a Keurig delivers!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great full handled coffee mug!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I have good sized hands and hate coffee mugs with dainty handles that I can only get a couple if fingers in the handle. These are great! I can get my whole hand inside the handle, even if it's a bit snug.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Right size, right handle, right weight. What's left.
customer_reviews.text: I hate coffee cups that are just that... a cup. These 16oz mugs are well made, easy to hold, and hefty. I got grey with black inside. Very tasteful. And they hold enough for a decent cup of coffee, even if you like it with a bunch of milk.
customer_reviews.author: ©ooper

customer_reviews.title: Great mug! These are perfect for so many hot ...
customer_reviews.text: Great mug! These are perfect for so many hot drinks and soups. The size is perfect because you don't have to refill so many times. The mugs I received are flawless. I would most definitely purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel Ruby

customer_reviews.title: These are 12oz mugs
customer_reviews.text: NOT 16oz. At 14oz they overflow. I bought these very nice mugs because they said they would hold 16oz.
customer_reviews.author: Whitebone

customer_reviews.title: I Looked A Long Time For The Perfect Mug
customer_reviews.text: What I love most about these mugs is when I heat something in the microwave...the contents get really hot, but the mug doesn't. The rim stays cool and won't burn your lip. The mugs are large and so are the handles. Nice grey color. I'm going to buy some more.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Rose

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 1 year ago. I love how they fit in your hand they are durable. The CPR is great. I just bought 4 more. My and my husbands favorite mugs.
customer_reviews.author: Volcan

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Color is true to pictures. Durable and pretty. If you are looking for a big coffee mug these are the ones.
customer_reviews.author: Tori J

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold and works as one would hope
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic mugs and due to the rectangular handle, are easy for my partner and myself to hold! Though when a Pyrex glassware item is dropped - accidentally flung - on one mug, it did loss the battle. We love these mugs so much though we bought a second set to suppliment the first as I accidentally and very clumsily break them over time.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful mugs, expertly packed
customer_reviews.text: These arrived expertly packed. They are beautiful mugs and are holding up great! I microwave them often and the handle always stays cool. Overall a great product!
customer_reviews.author: DtB Kami

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Mugs

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee cups/mugs!

product_meta.title: Culver SLAT Ceramic Mug, 16-Ounce, Grey White, Set of 4
product_meta.description: Color:Grey WhiteCulver's ceramic mugs are perfect for coffee, tea, hot chocolate, soup and more. These mugs will complement many table settings and kitchen counters. Good for the office as well. Culver offers a wide selection of colors and shapes for everyone. There are 4 identical mugs in this set.
feature_bullets: Culver SLAT Mug 16-Ounce Set of 4. SLAT mugs are elegant and colorful inner reactive glaze. Contrasting glossy grey exterior, Extra large comfort-grip handle
US Fluid Ounce Volume: These mugs hold 16 US Fluid Ounces Filled to the Top.

When using this Mug with a Single Brew Machine be sure to select a larger size mug then your brew size to allow room at the top for creamer, sugar, etc. All Culver Mug Volumes are based on the Entire Mug Filled to the Top
Culver Ceramic Mugs are Food Safe, Microwave Safe, Dishwasher Safe
Manufactured in China for Culver Industries, Inc. Hand inspected, packed, and distributed from Pittsburgh, PA

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars290 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
